name: ScrollTop
description: ScrollTop gets displayed after a certain scroll position and used to navigates to the top of the page quickly.

threshold.label: threshold
threshold.title: Defines the threshold value of the vertical scroll position of the target to toggle the visibility.

behavior.label: behavior
behavior.title: Defines the scrolling behaviour, 'smooth' adds an animation and 'auto' scrolls with a jump.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

pt-options.label: ptOptions
pt-options.title: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
